Banana Method - Extended Research
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 2 Archive (PSOne): Raising/Training Methods: Banana Method - Extended Research
By Monster Fenrick on Friday, July 13, 2001 - 08:40 pm:

ok, so we know the -10 gives a week of life, and the +10 takes a week of Life.

What about -9, -8, -7 etc, etc.
I am creating this for testing. I am raising a monster until the Very last week of life. and seeing with the different "-#" to see what numbers actually work.
Monster Fenrick

By Monster Fenrick on Friday, July 13, 2001 - 09:54 pm:

ok, he WAS at 100 loyalty, but resting the last couple of weeks brings him down to 99 Loyalty.
it is Dec Week 1, and he will Die Dec Week 2 If I rest.
-------------------------------------------------
Results:
99 -> MB -> 94 = -5 in Loyalty = Monster Died
99 -> MB -> 89 = -10 in Loyalty = Monster Lives
-------------------------------------------------
ok.. for the NEXT part of the test, with such High Loyalty i am only getting -5 or -10, so i am going to continue this method until Low Loyalty, when the numbers start breaking the Norm.

-------------------------------------------------
ok, the rest of this Data is me feeding MBs until he gets to Low Loyalty... now I make a strange discovery:

24 -> MB -> 19 = -5 in Loyalty = Monster Lived!!
19 -> MB -> 14 = -5 in Loyalty = Monster Lived!!
17 -> MB -> 12 = -5 in Loyalty = Monster Lived!!
15 -> MB -> 09 = -6 in Loyalty = Monster Lived!!
11 -> MB -> 06 = -5 in Loyalty = Monster Lived!!
09 -> MB -> 04 = -5 in Loyalty = Monster Lived!!
05 -> MB -> 0 = -5 in Loyalty = Monster Lived!!
04 -> MB -> 0 = -4 in Loyalty = Monster Lived!!
02 -> MB -> 0 = -2 in Loyalty = Monster Lived!!
0 -> MB -> 0 = -0 in Loyalty = Monster Lived!!

By Monster Fenrick on Friday, July 13, 2001 - 09:56 pm:

Ok.. so when does the change occur from -10 to gain a week of life ro -5 to gain a week of life?
(starting back over at 100 and testing Every Loyalty Drop of -5 until it gets me the +1 week of Life)

By Monster Fenrick on Friday, July 13, 2001 - 11:07 pm:

Hours have gone by. So Far from Loyalty 100 down to Loyalty 38 i can get only a -10 when the Bananas Drop the Loyalty.

However.. When at Loyalty 32 I got a -9.
32 -> MB -> 23 = -9 in Loyalty = Monster Lived!!

This brings me down to 23 Loyalty, which was proven only needs a -5 to gain the week of life.
Conclusion This Far: Loyalty about 30 or less requires only the -5 to -10 for 1 week of lifespan. Any other Participation would be Greatly Appreciated!

Monster Fenrick

By Monster Fenrick on Friday, July 13, 2001 - 11:12 pm:

For the record, this was tested with a ShiShi [Baku/???]

By mepersoner on Saturday, July 14, 2001 - 12:37 am:

Hmmmmm... good to know Fenrick, thank you, it'll make things easier with SI's method...

By Strunks on Monday, July 16, 2001 - 11:14 am:

My 7 year 5 months Zuum had 47 loyalty when I tried this. He only got a -1, -6, +3, and +9. After all of them he didn't live, but died. It could have something to do with high loyalty, or being spoiled. It might not work for above 30.
